needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: Figs, goat cheese, corn syrup and prosciutto are the secret ingredients that, combined, create the perfect pizza, according to the author, who suggests that similar natural systems should be applied to build the perfect workplace.
